definitions.definition: a particular position, point, or place.
examples: it is impossible to specify the exact locus in the brain of these neural events

definitions.definition: the effective or perceived location of something abstract.
examples: the real locus of power is the informal council

definitions.definition: the position of a gene or mutation on a chromosome.

a curve or other figure formed by all the points satisfying a particular equation of the relation between coordinates, or by a point, line, or surface moving according to mathematically defined conditions.
